snippet: An explosion and fire set off by an accidentally dropped hand grenade killed 25 soldiers during a stock check at an ammunition depot, the government said Thursday.
abstract: Explosion and fire set off by an accidentally dropped hand grenade kills 25 soldiers during a stock check at an ammunition depot in western Turkey.
lead_paragraph: An explosion and fire set off by an accidentally dropped hand grenade killed 25 soldiers during a stock check at an ammunition depot, the government said Thursday.
